description: A green mobile suit fielded by Neo Zeon, it is very similar in appearance to the NZ-000 Quin Mantha, though much smaller. It is armed with a total of twelve megaparticle cannons, two beam sabers, and twenty-four funnels (six in each binder). The pattern on its arms led to the Neo Zeon remnants being called "The Sleeves". Its pilot`s name is Marida Cruz. The Kshatriya was destroyed by the Unicorn Gundam when its NT-D System took control of the Kshatriya`s funnels and used them against it. Armed with Scattering mega beam cannon (chest) x4, mega beam cannon (binder) x8.
name: NZ-666 Kshatriya
